abstract: Study in PLoS Biology calculating first global estimate of annual visits to protected wilderness areas finds that such places receive 8 billion visits per year.
lead_paragraph: A team of British and American researchers has provided what they say is the first global estimate of annual visits to nature areas.

headline.main: World’s Protected Areas Draw Estimated 8 Billion Visitors Annually

snippet: A team of British and American researchers has provided what they say is the first global estimate of annual visits to nature areas.
